comments.body: 2024 is a blank canvas, an opportunity to turn the page and embark on a new chapter. So, it’s good to start with a fresh perspective that says, “Hey, 2024, I’m ready for whatever you throw my way!”
Saying goodbye to the old year is like shedding a skin. In 2024, let's emerge stronger, wiser, and ready for new adventures.
Get the latest Malaysia news stories and opinions with focus on National, Regional, Sarawak and World News, as well as reports from Parliament and Court.
